full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHYUNG KHRA LA BRTEN PA'I BYABS BSRUNG BYED TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NYID DPON SRAS RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG DPAL 'BYOR SKU ZHABS NAS, 'DI LTAR GYIS ZHES BSKUL BA'I TSE, KHYUNG KHRA LA BRTEN PA'I BYABS KHRUS SNGON KYI DAM PAS MDZAD PA MI SNANG BAS, 'DIR RANG BZOR BGYIS PA'I NYES PAR 'GYUR DOGS NA'ANG, BYED TSUL SHES NA NI MI 'GAL BAR MTHONG ZHING, BSKUL BA PO'I NGO BZLOG MA NUS PAR SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BSHAD SGRUB MING CAN GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BGYIS PA'O BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
